description:
Green up your lawn fast

Grow the greenest lawn on the block fast with our highest iron concentration formula.

Supercharged with iron citrate, Iron Boost provides rapid deep greening, sustained growth and address iron deficiencies in your soil. Need more? The nutrient-rich combo of potassium and seaweed extract increase stress resilience for every blade. A new and improved formula for a greener, healthier lawn.

A Sunday premium selection

Premium fertilizers, enriched with potent nutrients and unique soil enhancers, outperform standard options to deliver superior, long-lasting lawn health.

sections.product_features:
20-0-1 NPK (nitrogen-phosphorus-potassium) liquid lawn fertilizer
Premium fertilizer — concentrated nutrients and specialty ingredients
Addresses iron deficiencies in soil
Supports rapid deep greening, growth and stress resilience
Made for any lawn and grass type
Formulated without pesticides
User-friendly hose-on application
1 pouch covers up to 5,000 sq. ft.
Includes liquid fertilizer in flexible reduced plastic packaging and a custom-engineered universal hose-end sprayer
sections.ingredients:
Nitrogen: For healthy grass growth
Iron citrate: For rapid deep greening
sections.instructions:
For best results, apply early morning or evening, and make sure your lawn is adequately hydrated. Avoid use on drought-affected or heat-stressed lawns.
Connect the universal sprayer to your hose and the fertilizer pouch. This sprayer is designed for the optimal mix of water and nutrients.
Apply the fertilizer across your lawn until the pouch is empty, which should take about 10-15 minutes. Once the fertilizer dries, you can get back out on your grass.
Reapply every 4-6 weeks spring through fall. Keep the sprayer for future applications
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
What does iron do for my lawn?
Iron helps give your lawn a deep green color, kickstarting its growth without adding too much nitrogen. It's not just for looks; iron also strengthens grass growth and root health.
Why is my soil deficient in iron?
Iron can be hard for grass to absorb from soil, which is why it might seem deficient. Sunday includes iron in a chelated form in many of our products, making it easier for your grass to take up and benefit from.
How are Sunday premium liquid fertilizers different?
Sunday's premium liquid fertilizers, once exclusive to custom lawn plans, are highly concentrated with nutrients, soil amendments, and specialty ingredients for effective and fast results.
How to apply boost pouches alongside other Sunday fertilizers
Boosts with nutrients can be used in combination with your Sunday Lawn Plans or other fertilizers. For best results, follow the instructions below.
For liquid fertilizer: First, apply the boost pouch, then wait 7 to 10 days before applying the liquid fertilizer.
For granular: Apply boost pouch, wait 4-6 weeks, then apply granular fertilizer.
When is it safe for people and pets to go on my lawn after applying?
Our ingredients break down quickly and don’t persist in the environment. After our products dry, you can get back to using your lawn!
Are there any US states where this is not approved for use?
This product is approved for use in all states.
